channel.title: SOme Help would b Nice
channel.description:
hey i need some help (0bviously lol) :D Okay anyways i wanted to add some stuff to my server to make it nice =] so this is what i need: I was wondering if somebody has a tut on clan wars, so i can put to my server. I have a 317 server btw. Also how to make npcs talk, and how to put custom items in my server. i looked at many tuts but whenever i spawn my item it looks like some guy took a shit..... Last thing is: i want a command which i find hard to make, ::allstafftome which would mean that all the staff members of my server would teleport to me, not any normal players.
Thank-you and i appreciate your time :D P.s: I'm a first time coder :D

well atleast its something lol, urmm yeah i go to npchandler…then what?

sup umm for your first question to make npc’s talk go to your source and look for npc handler) i dont know about the clan wars)but ::allstafftome im still learning how to make commands maybe u could go in client and look for commands my friend show me but i forgot this s all i can help u with
